about_the_game:
Tobor Party

Tobor Party is a competitive racing game where you race your friends as a Tobor around the UTD (the University of Texas at Dallas) campus. There are a variety of power-ups to collect to gain an advantage or mess with your friends! Don't like the way your Tobor looks? Well, you can change it to a variety of different skins, including all the different schools at UTD.


Feel free to use Steam Remote Play or Parsec to play online with your friends!

Content

  • one map (soon to be more)
  • 11 skins
  • variety of different items
  • drifting
  • timed checkpoint system
  • local multiplayer

Developers are all UTD students or alum

  • Tryston Minsquero
  • Lucas Jaggernauth
  • Phu Le
  • Cameron Meyer
  • Henry Werner
  • J.C. Steed

Tobor Party

Tobor Party is a competitive racing game where you race your friends as a Tobor around the UTD (the University of Texas at Dallas) campus. There are a variety of power-ups to collect to gain an advantage or mess with your friends! Don't like the way your Tobor looks? Well, you can change it to a variety of different skins, including all the different schools at UTD.


Feel free to use Steam Remote Play or Parsec to play online with your friends!

  • 11 skins
  • variety of different items

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only wireless gamepads are supported.

name: Tobor Party

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GH Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: A local multiplayer racing game where you play as Tobors driving around the UTD campus!
